title: Ninja Tabis needs to be nerfed
body:
Let's start buffing ADCs by nerfing this insanely broken item

The champions it's meant to counter it doesn't even work on anymore because of conqueror (Jax, Yi, Trynda)

Instead it just demolishes ADC damage output and punishes them for doing well by being a % decrease

replies.body:
No.

Tabis is one of the last viable tank items remaining in the game.
We need less damage not more damage.
Hell naw.  We all love tabis.
Nope, it's probably too weak right now, I actually suggest buffing the armour to 25.
Sure ,lets nerf the only viable defense item...
After IE and zeal item ADCs deal true dmg as well... Tabi is great item to survie early game against most auto attack champions..

{{item:3047}} is needed to even be able to play against {{champion:39}} {{champion:157}} ….even {{champion:122}} as a tank (cause ofc darius is gonna buy a damn trinity and auto you for his stacks.

A nerf to {{item:3047}} can quickly f**** over toplane tanks.



Also they ALREADY nerfed {{item:3047}} , and I think it was around the time when they nerfed {{item:1401}} from giving 20% bonus health to 15%
{{item:3047}} + {{item:3143}} works well vs jax and tryn or any crit auto attackers
but.... nerfing them would just increase jax yi and tryndameres damage outputs anyway....
